Address.Address1: 2, HAI AN ROAD, PEARL RIVER NEW CITY

Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Dan Executive Apartment Guangzhou in Guangzhou (Tianhe), you'll be close to Guangzhou Library and Pazhou Complex. This aparthotel is within close proximity of Guangdong Museum and Flower City Square.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 218 air-conditioned rooms featuring refrigerators and LCD televisions. Rooms have private balconies. Complimentary high-speed (wired) Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with showers feature designer toiletries and complimentary toiletries.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take in the views from a terrace and make use of amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access and concierge services.

Dining
Enjoy a meal at a restaurant, or stay in and take advantage of the aparthotel's room service (during limited hours).

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a business center, express check-in, and express check-out. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available on request).


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
Enjoy a meal at a restaurant, or stay in and take advantage of the aparthotel's room service (during limited hours).
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Guangzhou Library - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Guangdong Museum - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi
Flower City Square - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Guangzhou Opera House - 1.7 km / 1.1 mi
Tianhe Stadium - 1.8 km / 1.1 mi
CITIC Plaza - 2.1 km / 1.3 mi

Canton Tower - 2.3 km / 1.4 mi
Taikoo Hui - 2.9 km / 1.8 mi

Guangdong Museum of Art - 3.3 km / 2.1 mi
Xinghai Concert Hall - 3.5 km / 2.2 mi
Guangzhou Zoo - 3.5 km / 2.2 mi
Pazhou Complex - 3.9 km / 2.4 mi
Redtory Art and Design Factory - 4.1 km / 2.5 mi

The preferred airport for Dan Executive Apartment Guangzhou is Guangzhou (CAN-Baiyun Intl.) - 30.4 km / 18.9 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.
